alert.note: Alert for Northern Clearwater Mountains; Orofino, Grangeville Region; Southern Clearwater Mountains (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Missoula (Western Montana and Central Idaho)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 03 at 4:01PM MDT by NWS Missoula
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of central Idaho and central Clearwater Counties through 345 PM PDT... At 258 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a gust front from a line of thunderstorms extending from 12 miles northeast of Elk River to 6 miles northwest of Headquarters to 9 miles northwest of Lowell to 26 miles east of Grangeville to 44 miles northeast of McCall. Movement was east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Pierce, Headquarters, Lowell, Dixie, Red River Hot Spring, Musselshell, Cardiff, Glenwood, Orogrande, Elk City, Fall Creek, Mackay Bar, Newsome, Jaype, Syringa and Golden. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: These storms may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.

area.areaDesc: Northern Clearwater Mountains; Orofino, Grangeville Region; Southern Clearwater Mountains
